desc: Heirloom quality Waldorf and Montessori toys. From wooden building blocks, cars, doll houses and more. Shop our collection of Holztiger, Maileg, Bauspiel, Pehr, Papoose, Gluckskafer and more. Free shipping for orders over $75 within Canada. Low flat rate to USA available.
